message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you my [product description] for a price that I believe is mutually beneficial. This product is worth at least $1000000 to me, but I'm willing to sell it to you for $1150000. This price allows you to make a significant profit while ensuring I receive a fair value for my investment.  Consider this offer carefully, as I'm confident you won't find a better deal. Let me know your decision.
